name: Fatso (AlexRutishauser)
description: It’s another day at school, and you are just fed up with life. People bully you every day for how fat you are, even if they don’t know anything about you. It’s the same deal every day at Mountain Oak High School, you want to leave and quit so bad for how everyone treats you. But, you want to make your mom proud because she does so much for you and is your number one supporter so you can’t give up on her. Today is the day you make your own decisions, and your choices will determine your outcome for the rest of your day, or even your life.
